title: Renovated 2Br Apartment - View TODAY - Students Welcome - Pre-Market
posting_body: ['Available for immediate move-in.', 'Not yet listed on Streeteasy - Showing Monday 8/1 and Tuesday 8/2 only.', 'Video available on Iinstagram @numarealestate', 'APARTMENT & PROPERTY FEATURES:', '- 2 Queen-sized bedrooms', '- Newly Renovated', '- Microwave', '- Elevator', '- Wall A/C Unit', '- Live-in Super', '- Heat and hot water included in rent', '- Laundry Room in Building', '- Steps to A, C, E, 1 trains, Penn Station; M11, M20, M23, M34 buses; Chelsea Piers, The High Line, NYU, NYU Dental, Baruch, The New School, Pratt, Hudson Yards, Shopping, Dining, and Entertainment!', '-', 'OUTSTANDING Value!!!', 'Call or text me at', '646.580.3511', 'ASAP for the best deals, and courteous, professional, and prompt service!', 'EASY PROCESS -- QUICK APPROVAL', '- Turnaround time from application (with all paperwork) to lease signing can be as little as 2 days', 'TO QUALIFY:', '- Good Credit', '- Income 40x rent', '- Guarantors Accepted', '- International Renters Welcome', '- Minimum one (1) year lease', '- Broker Fee Applies', 'Viewing Hours by Appointment', 'To set up a viewing, or for any questions, call or text me for quicker response.', 'Ritchie Numa', 'Licensed Real Estate Salesperson', 'Oxford Property Group', 'Mobile: 646.580.3511', 'Have a great day!']
